verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H365>Aijeleth<s%> <S%H7837>Shahar<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. My <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H410>God<s%>, why hast thou <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me? why art thou so <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H3444>helping<s%> me, and from the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H7581>roaring<s%>? Aijeleth: or, the hind of the morning helping: Heb. my salvation

O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H7121>cry<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, but thou <S%H6030>hearest<s%> not; and in the night <S%H3915>season<s%>, and am not <S%H1747>silent<s%>. am: Heb. there is no silence to me
But thou art <S%H6918>holy<s%>, O thou that <S%H3427>inhabitest<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thee: they <S%H982>trusted<s%>, and thou didst <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them.
They <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto thee, and were <S%H4422>delivered<s%>: they <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thee, and were not <S%H954>confounded<s%>.
But I am a <S%H8438>worm<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%>; a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, and <S%H959>despised<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
All they that <S%H7200>see<s%> me laugh me to <S%H3932>scorn<s%>: they shoot <S%H6358>out<s%> the <S%H8193>lip<s%>, they <S%H5128>shake<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>, saying, shoot: Heb. open

He <S%H1556>trusted<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that he would <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him: let him <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him, seeing he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in him. He trusted: Heb. He rolled himself on seeing: or, if he delight in
But thou art he that <S%H1518>took<s%> me out of the <S%H990>womb<s%>: thou didst make me <S%H982>hope<s%> when I was upon my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%>. didst: or, kept me in safety
I was <S%H7993>cast<s%> upon thee from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>: thou art my <S%H410>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>belly<s%>.
Be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; for <S%H6869>trouble<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>; for there is none to <S%H5826>help<s%>. none: Heb. not a helper
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me: <S%H47>strong<s%> bulls of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have beset me <S%H3803>round<s%>.
They <S%H6475>gaped<s%> upon me with their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, as a <S%H2963>ravening<s%> and a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%>. gaped: Heb. opened their mouths against me

I am poured <S%H8210>out<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>, and all my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are out of <S%H6504>joint<s%>: my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is like <S%H1749>wax<s%>; it is <S%H4549>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H4578>bowels<s%>. out of: or, sundered

My <S%H3581>strength<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%> like a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%>; and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to my <S%H4455>jaws<s%>; and thou hast <S%H8239>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.

For <S%H3611>dogs<s%> have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me: the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%> have <S%H5362>inclosed<s%> me: they <S%H3738>pierced<s%> <S%H738><s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> all my <S%H6106>bones<s%>: they <S%H5027>look<s%> and <S%H7200>stare<s%> upon me.
They <S%H2505>part<s%> my <S%H899>garments<s%> among them, and <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> upon my <S%H3830>vesture<s%>.
But be not thou <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: O my <S%H360>strength<s%>, <S%H2363>haste<s%> thee to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; my <S%H3173>darling<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3611>dog<s%>. my darling: Heb. my only one power: Heb. hand
<S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for thou hast <S%H6030>heard<s%> me from the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>unicorns<s%>.
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> unto my <S%H251>brethren<s%>: in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> thee.

Ye that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H1984>praise<s%> him; all ye the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3513>glorify<s%> him; and <S%H1481>fear<s%> him, all ye the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For he hath not <S%H959>despised<s%> nor <S%H8262>abhorred<s%> the <S%H6039>affliction<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>; neither hath he <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from him; but when he <S%H7768>cried<s%> unto him, he <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
My <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be of thee in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>: I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> before them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: they shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him: your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

All the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%> shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and all the <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.
For the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%>: and he is the <S%H4910>governor<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

All they that be <S%H1879>fat<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%>: all they that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and none can keep <S%H2421>alive<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
A <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him; it shall be <S%H5608>accounted<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> for a <S%H1755>generation<s%>.
They shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born<s%>, that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> this.
